TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_bazi', title = bazi', year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/bazi'} }

S.FORM: bazi' baziy yaya musa su sinkina ga baziy cikay bwax ha... ... mbaziy yaya musa su inu musa si mbaziy cikay bwax.. ' ... mtbaziy nanu cyux su pcwagun nyux saku mtbaziy qwau na tayal.. ... sptbaziy yaqix qu turaq qani la, sptbaziy maku ki plmujan, aki kya cika pila bbazi mu ramat.. ....
